statusLine.command: input=$(cat); printf '\033[32m%s@%s\033[0m:\033[34m%s\033[0m%s' "$(whoami)" "$(hostname -s)" "$(pwd)" "$(if git rev-parse --git-dir > /dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git branch 2> /dev/null | sed -e '/^[^*]/d' -e 's/* \(.*\)/\1/'); git_status=''; if [[ $(git status --porcelain 2> /dev/null) ]]; then git_status="${git_status}*"; fi; if ! git diff --cached --quiet 2> /dev/null; then git_status="${git_status}+"; fi; upstream=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref --symbolic-full-name @{u} 2> /dev/null); if [[ -n "$upstream" ]]; then ahead=$(git rev-list @{u}..HEAD --count 2> /dev/null); behind=$(git rev-list HEAD..@{u} --count 2> /dev/null); if [[ $ahead -gt 0 ]]; then git_status="${git_status}↑${ahead}"; fi; if [[ $behind -gt 0 ]]; then git_status="${git_status}↓${behind}"; fi; fi; printf ' \033[35m(%s%s)\033[0m' "$branch" "$git_status"; fi)"
